about_the_game:
Experience a sneak peek of Push³, the 3D reimagining of the classic Sokoban puzzle game, with this demo featuring the first five levels. Solve strategic block-pushing puzzles, navigate obstacles, and get a taste of the satisfying gameplay that awaits in the full version.

This demo introduces you to the core mechanics and the relaxing atmosphere of Push³. Whether you’re new to the genre or a Sokoban fan, these initial challenges will give you a glimpse into the unique puzzles and dynamic 3D environments the full game has to offer.

Demo Features:

  • 5 Introductory Levels: A curated selection of puzzles to help you learn the game’s mechanics and get started.

  • Simple yet Challenging Gameplay: Easy to understand but with growing complexity to keep you thinking.

  • Vibrant 3D World: Enjoy the beautifully crafted environments and smooth animations that bring the puzzles to life.

  • Relaxing Experience: Unwind with soothing music and stress-free puzzle-solving, perfect for a quick break.

Dive into the demo and start solving puzzles today—your journey to mastering Push³ begins here!

name: Push³ Demo
short_description: Try the demo of Push³ and solve the first five levels of this 3D Sokoban puzzle game, featuring strategic block-pushing puzzles and relaxing gameplay.
supported_languages: Arabic, Bulgarian, Czech, Danish, Dutch, Finnish, Greek, Hungarian, Japanese, Korean, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Romanian, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Swedish, Thai, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Bosnian, Hebrew
